pageContext.name: delegate

frontmatter.title: Start delegate with us
frontmatter.subtitle: Earn interests on your CRO in a secured environment

pageContext.html:
Delegate your CRO to Libertas Staking pool

If you have your CRO on the Ethereum blockchain as ERC-20 token, you need to migrate them first. Click here to open the migration guide

At the moment you can only use the desktop application or the CLI to delegate to a community pool. It will also be implemented soon on the Defi Wallet Mobile App.

Cripto.org chain Desktop Wallet

First of all we need to download the app for our platform. Click here to open the download page

After that we have downloaded the application and created or restored our wallet ( remember to keep your mnemonic phrase in a safe place ), we can start to delegate our CRO.

We have to select the Staking tab

Then select Delegate funds tab and put the Libertas Validator Address in the Validator address field

Libertas Validator Address is: crocncl1dayf6c9vycqced70p6cx70334ctafz8j0wp6t2

Now our funds are delegated and we'll start earn interests on our CRO.

sections.title: Your Crypto.org chain staking pool operator

features.title: Simple
features.image_alt: Get Crypto.org app for any devices
features.content:
Start earn interests on your CRO with one tap.
You can delegate to Libertas Staking from your mobile or pc.

features.title: Secure
features.content:
Libertas is securing its stake pool with sentry nodes.
We use Prometheus and Grafana to monitor our systems and get alerted of issues.
All our servers are located in Europe.

features.title: Democratic
features.image_alt: Libertas is a democratic staking pool
features.content:
Our fee is set at 3%.
Libertas keeps fees low as possible to enable anyone to access the crypto world.

features.title: Keep in touch
features.content: Continue your Libertas experience on our Twitter account.

pages.name: migration

frontmatter.title: CRO Token Migration
frontmatter.subtitle: From ERC-20 to Crypto.org chain coin

seo.title: CRO Token Migration
seo.description: A story about customer loyalty curabitur sed consectetur nisi. Integer sit amet commodo massa.

pages.html:
In order to use your CRO in the Crypto.org chain, you need to migrate your CRO from Ethereum to this new chain.

The migration process depends on where you hold your CRO.

  • Crypto.com App & Exchange Users

    Your ERC20 CRO will be automatically converted to native CRO when you withdraw.

  • Crypto.com DeFi Wallet Users

    You can migrate your ERC20 CRO to native CRO using our simple, in-app migration tool.

  • Web Migration Tool

    Easily connect your MetaMask or Ledger wallet to our CRO Web Migration Tool, and follow the on-screen instructions. Sign up to the Crypto.com App or Exchange to migrate your tokens with a few taps.

    Click here to open the official guide
